rooms.description: Open and spacious living room with high ceilings to allow natural light; designed for social gatherings.
Adjacent to the kitchen; features a dining table with ample seating for family meals.
Modern open-kitchen with Brutalist elements like exposed concrete and robust materials, ensuring functionality and style.
Serves as entry point and transitional space from outside to the interior of the apartment.
A small utility space for waste disposal, adhering to local building norms for sanitation.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed with robust materials and Vastu-aligned positioning.
Large window to enhance natural light in the living room, placed on the east facade as per Vastu principles.
Window for dining area ensuring light during breakfast and evening meals.

notes.detail: The design incorporates exposed concrete elements, raw textures, and robust materials to evoke a Brutalist style while ensuring modern comfort.
While the ground floor is dedicated to common areas and living spaces, the upper level houses private bedrooms with integrated features like a home theater.
